executable.title: Voting Resample
executable.description: Resamples an image based on simple voting
executable.documentation-url: Resamples the a labelmap to the given spacing. The resampling is done using a voting scheme. For each output voxel, the the value of that voxel is given by the most represented value around that voxel.

float-vector.name: outputSpacing
float-vector.description: Spacing along each dimension (0 means use input spacing)
float-vector.label: Spacing

integer-vector.name: highPrecedenceLabels
integer-vector.label: High Precedence Labels
integer-vector.description: List of label values (comma separated) that should take precedence when multiple labels are competing for the same voxel. Highest precedence labels are used first. For example, "209, 253, 111" would make the label 209 always overwrite the label 111 if they are competing for in the same voxel.

integer-vector.name: lowPrecedenceLabels
integer-vector.label: Low Precedence Labels
integer-vector.description: List of label values (comma separated) that should *NOT* take precedence when multiple labelsare competing for the same voxel. Lowest precedence labels are listed first. For example, "143, 5, 17" would make the label 17 always overwrite the label 143 if they are competing for in the same voxel.
